text: Finally , survey participants were asked to indicate , by way of forced choice , their response to this statement : " Breaking or not obeying a quarantine order is most like which of the following [ choose 1 only ] : ( a ) parking in a no - parking zone ; ( b ) driving way above the speed limit on a busy street ; or ( c ) physical assault . " Fully 59 % responded that breaking quarantine is most like ' physical assault , ' whereas 27 % selected ' driving above the speed limit ' and 8 % chose ' parking in a no - parking zone ' ( 6 % did not answer ) .
